entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11 with temperature falling to 7 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 11 with temperature falling to 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
